hero.title: Our Journey
hero.subtitle: From a Vision to a Legacy

timeline.title: Milestones in Our Journey
timeline.description: Two decades of growth, innovation, and excellence in higher education

events.title: Foundation & Vision
events.description: FS University was established with the vision of providing world-class education in rural Uttar Pradesh, honoring the legacy of Late Shri Fulan Singh Ji.
events.details: The university was founded on 325 acres of lush green campus with state-of-the-art infrastructure, beginning with just 3 schools and 150 students.

events.title: Academic Expansion
events.description: Launched School of Engineering & Technology and School of Management, introducing cutting-edge programs in emerging fields.
events.details: Added 5 new undergraduate programs and established partnerships with industry leaders. Student enrollment reached 1,000.

events.title: UGC Recognition
events.description: Achieved University Grants Commission recognition under Section 2(f) and 12(B), marking a significant milestone in our growth.
events.details: This recognition opened doors for research funding and enhanced credibility. Established dedicated research centers.

events.title: Research Excellence
events.description: Established dedicated research facilities and launched Ph.D. programs across multiple disciplines.
events.details: Built advanced laboratories worth ₹50 crores and signed MoUs with 25+ international universities.

events.title: Digital Transformation
events.description: Successfully transitioned to digital learning during the pandemic, ensuring uninterrupted education for all students.
events.details: Implemented comprehensive LMS, virtual labs, and online assessment systems. 100% digital transition achieved in 2 weeks.

events.title: NAAC A+ Accreditation
events.description: Achieved NAAC A+ grade, becoming one of the top-rated private universities in North India.
events.details: Scored 3.6/4.0 CGPA in NAAC assessment, recognizing excellence in teaching, research, and infrastructure.

events.title: Global Recognition
events.description: Ranked #1 Private University in UP and achieved 96% placement rate with top-tier companies.
events.details: Over 15,000 alumni working in 50+ countries. Established campuses in Dubai and Singapore.

gallery.title: Through the Years
gallery.description: Memorable moments from our two-decade journey

cta.title: Be a Part of Our Next Chapter
cta.description: Join our legacy of excellence and help us write the future of education. Your journey with FS University starts here.
